title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Pressing 'Add' in the associated editors list enables multiple selection and marks the default entry. Additionally, the dialog should have a width hint. The File editors Preference page grows in height when selected, unlike other pages. Fixes for these issues have been released. 

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also:

- 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.
- Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
EB: 'Add' should not add a hidden entry. Entries already existing in the associated editors are available for selection.
SR:
- Open the editor selection dialog
- Press 'Add'
- Verify that a hidden entry is not added
- Verify that entries already existing in the associated editors are not selectable
